page.title: 07EMPLOYMENT IN EAGLESFIELD
page.content: Although this is a farming area {agriculture}does not employ many people,most farms are run by one family with in some cases one farm worker. The small{shops}and businesses based in the area employ a few people,see section on Shops and services. The majority work away from their homes mostly using cars to make the journey. British Nuclear Fuels{power station at Chapelcross and Pinneys{salmon and {seafoods}processing plant at Brydekirk take the greatest number. Other people travel to Lockerbie, Annan, Dumfries or Carlisle to work.
